result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Steven L Rowe appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Steven C. Harvey in court for Steven L Rowe.  Plaintiff State of Wisconsin in court by ADA JJ Crawford. Matter before the Court for plea and sentencing as to all files - **SEE ATTACHED MINUTE SHEET**
Application for Jail Time Credit form

Defendant Steven L Rowe appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Steven C. Harvey in court for Steven L Rowe.  Prosecuting attorney Vivien L. TenHaken in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Harvey motions the court to modify bond. State objects bond motion.  Bond remains. Amended information filed. Not guilty plea entered and trial reserved. Scheduling Order will be provided to Attys via e-filing by the Court. Speedy trial demanded by defendant.
Final pre-trial scheduled for November 23, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Jury trial - 12 person scheduled for December 5, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Plaintiff's Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.

records.addlTxt:
3:03 PM (64-06) Defendant Steven L Rowe appeared by video.  Attorney Andrew Herrmann in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Steve Harvey in court for Steven Rowe.
Matter was scheduled for a preliminary hearing but the defendant wishes to waive his right to a preliminary hearing.  Response by Counsel, stands and defendant to Court's questions.  Court finds defendant freely, knowingly and voluntarily waives his right to a preliminary hearing and binds the defendant over. 

State is requesting an Arraignment date.

Adj. 3:06PM
Arraignment scheduled for September 28, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Steven L Rowe in court, in custody by video.  Attorney Steven C. Harvey in court for Steven L Rowe.  Attorney Harvey to be appointed to this case. Prosecuting attorney Andrew Herrmann in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant given complaint; charges/penalties explained by the court. PRELIMINARY HEARING INFORMATION AND RIGHS GIVEN, HEARING REQUESED WITHIN TIME PERIODS.  Minutes filed.
Final pre-trial scheduled for October 26, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 12, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Jury trial - 12 person scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Cash bond filed. Defendant refused to sign.

BOND TO COVER 22GF891, 22CF386, 22CF33, 21CM599, & 21CF461

DEFENDANT MUST COMPLY WITH PRETRIAL SERVICES IF RELEASED. 
Defendant shall not possess or consume alcohol. Defendant shall not drive a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license. Defendant shall not possess or use illegal drugs or drug paraphernalia or controlled substances.  Any prescribed medication is to be taken within the terms / limits of the prescription.  Defendant will not possess any firearms, ammunition or other weapons. Defendant is to be booked and printed within twenty-four (24) hours. Defendant will not in any way contact or attempt to contact any victim(s) listed and will avoid their residence/place of employment or any place they are located and will avoid causing any other person, other than defendant's attorney, from doing so on defendant's behalf.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as through the mail, by telephone, by way of electronic device, in person, or through a third party.  VICTIM(S)/RESIDENCE(S): NO CONTACT WITH RESIDENCE @ 318 N. 8TH STREET DELAVAN, WI. Defendant will not in any way contact or attempt to contact any co-actor(s) listed and will avoid their residence/place of employment or any place they are located and will avoid causing any other person, other than defendant's attorney, from doing so on defendant's behalf.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as through the mail, by telephone, by way of electronic device, in person, or through a third party.  CO-ACTOR(S)/RESIDENCE(S): NO CONTACT WITH ERATUS GREEN. Defendant shall personally ensure that payments are made under any Order for Income Withholding if the Court appoints an attorney for the defendant.

Defendant Steven L Rowe in court, in custody by video. Samuel Berg appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Steven Harvey appeared for bond purposes only. New total cash bond set, same conditions as 22CF386. Minutes filed.
Hearing scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
